transArray.content: The location is in the car city and the positioning is not accurate.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Hotel Beijing Wukesong and sharing your stay experience with us. I am very sorry that this stay could not bring you a better stay experience. Since the South Gate of the Auto Park will be closed after 19:00 in the evening, you can navigate to the East Gate 2 of the Badelli Auto Park, or call the hotel front desk 24 hours a day for consultation. Your opinions are very important. We will make rectifications as soon as possible. It is our responsibility to provide you with high-quality services and as comfortable a stay as possible. Thank you for your understanding and your valuable opinions. We will work hard to improve everything. In terms of aspects, I believe that you will have a better stay experience next time you stay. The hotel looks forward to your visit again and wishes you a happy life!
